IRS990.Desc: CAROLINA MEDICORP ENTERPRISES, INC. (CME) IS MADE UP OF QUALITY PHYSICIANS IN A VARIETY OF PRIMARY AND SPECIALTY AREAS PROVIDING GENERAL MEDICAL AND OCCUPATIONAL MEDICINE SERVICES. CME EXISTS TO ADVANCE AND SUPPORT THE PROMOTION OF THE HEALTH OF THE INHABITANTS OF FORSYTH COUNTY, NC AND SURROUNDING AREAS THROUGH THE OPERATION OF URGENT AND OCCUPATIONAL CARE CENTERS AND THE OPERATION OF PRIMARY AND SPECIALTY PHYSICIAN PRACTICES. IN JANUARY 2023, THE ORGANIZATION CONVERTED TO A LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC, A TAX-EXEMPT HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION, AND ALL CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE REPORTED ON THE NOVANT HEALTH, INC.'S FORM 990.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
SCHEDULE A, PART III, SHORT YEAR EXPLANATION:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE 2023 AMOUNTS ARE REPORTED FOR THE SHORT YEAR FROM JANUARY 1, 2023 THROUGH JANUARY 31, 2023.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN JANUARY 2023, THE ORGANIZATION CONVERTED TO A LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC, A TAX-EXEMPT HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION, AND ALL CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE REPORTED ON THE NOVANT HEALTH, INC.'S FORM 990. SINCE THIS IS A SHORT YEAR RETURN IN WHICH THERE IS NO CALENDAR YEAR THAT ENDS WITH OR WITHIN THE SHORT YEAR, WE ARE NOT REPORTING COMPENSATION FOR ANYONE LISTED IN PART VII.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PI, L1: ORGANIZATION'S MISSION OR MOST SIGNIFICANT ACTIVITIES
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CAROLINA MEDICORP ENTERPRISES DOING BUSINESS AS NOVANT HEALTH-GOHEALTH URGENT CARE, IS AN INTEGRAL PART OF THE NOVANT HEALTH SYSTEM (COLLECTIVELY KNOWN AS "NOVANT HEALTH"), A NOT-FOR-PROFIT INTEGRATED GROUP OF HOSPITALS, PHYSICIAN CLINICS, OUTPATIENT CENTERS AND OTHER HEALTHCARE SERVICE PROVIDERS. THE NOVANT HEALTH NETWORK CONSISTS OF MORE THAN 1,800 PHYSICIANS AND OVER 35,000 TEAM MEMBERS THAT PROVIDE CARE AT NEARLY 800 LOCATIONS, INCLUDING 15 MEDICAL CENTERS AND HUNDREDS OF OUTPATIENT FACILITIES AND PHYSICIAN CLINICS. HEADQUARTERED IN WINSTON-SALEM, NORTH CAROLINA, NOVANT HEALTH IS COMMITTED TO MAKING HEALTHCARE REMARKABLE FOR PATIENTS AND COMMUNITIES PROVIDING NEARLY SIX MILLION PATIENT VISITS ANNUALLY. NOVANT HEALTH-GOHEALTH URGENT CARE PROVIDES PROVIDER AND OTHER CLINICAL SUPPORT TO THE JOINT VENTURE OPERATIONS OF NOVANT HEALTH-GOHEALTH URGENT CARE WHICH OPERATES MULTIPLE CLINICS PROVIDING URGENT CARE AND OCCUPATIONAL MEDICINE SERVICES IN NORTH CAROLINA. NOVANT HEALTH-GOHEALTH URGENT CARE OFFERS EXTENDED OFFICE HOURS AND DEPENDABLE MEDICAL COVERAGE FOR UNEXPECTED HEALTH NEEDS, MINOR MEDICAL EMERGENCIES AND BASIC FAMILY MEDICINE SERVICES. EACH CLINIC PROVIDES MEDICAL CARE IN LOCAL NEIGHBORHOODS AND COMMUNITIES, COLLECTIVELY WORKING TOGETHER TO IMPROVE THE PRACTICE OF MEDICINE. IN JANUARY 2023, THE ORGANIZATION CONVERTED TO A LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC, A TAX-EXEMPT HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION, AND ALL CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE REPORTED ON THE NOVANT HEALTH, INC.'S FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1: MISSION, VISION, AND VALUES
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MISSION NOVANT HEALTH EXISTS TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH OF OUR COMMUNITIES, ONE PERSON AT A TIME. VISION WE, THE NOVANT HEALTH TEAM, WILL DELIVER THE MOST REMARKABLE PATIENT EXPERIENCE, IN EVERY DIMENSION, EVERY TIME. VALUES -COMPASSION: WE TREAT OUR CUSTOMERS AND THEIR FAMILIES, STAFF AND OTHER HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS AS FAMILY MEMBERS WITH KINDNESS, PATIENCE, EMPATHY AND RESPECT. -DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION: WE RECOGNIZE THAT EVERY PERSON IS DIFFERENT, EACH SHAPED BY UNIQUE LIFE EXPERIENCES. THIS ENABLES US TO BETTER UNDERSTAND EACH OTHER AND OUR CUSTOMERS. BY ENGAGING THE STRENGTHS AND TALENTS OF EACH TEAM MEMBER, WE ENSURE A STRONG ORGANIZATION CAPABLE OF PROVIDING REMARKABLE HEALTHCARE TO OUR PATIENTS, FAMILIES AND COMMUNITIES. -PERSONAL EXCELLENCE: WE STRIVE TO GROW PERSONALLY AND PROFESSIONALLY AND APPROACH EACH SERVICE OPPORTUNITY WITH A POSITIVE, FLEXIBLE ATTITUDE. HONESTY AND PERSONAL INTEGRITY GUIDE ALL WE DO. -TEAMWORK: THE NEEDS AND EXPECTATIONS OF ANY ONE CUSTOMER ARE GREATER THAN WHAT ONE PERSON'S SERVICE EFFORTS CAN SATISFY. WE SUPPORT EACH OTHER SO THAT TOGETHER AS A TEAM, WE CAN BE SUCCESSFUL IN THE EYE OF THE CUSTOMER AS A QUALITY SERVICE PROVIDER. -COURAGE: WE ACT BOLDLY IN MAKING THE CHANGES NECESSARY TO ACHIEVE OUR MISSION, VISION AND PROMISE OF DELIVERING REMARKABLE HEALTHCARE. -SAFETY: WE EMBRACE A CULTURE IN WHICH "FIRST, DO NO HARM" IS THE FOUNDATION OF REMARKABLE HEALTHCARE. OUR WORK ENVIRONMENT IS ONE OF OPEN COMMUNICATION, HIGH-RELIABILITY, AND A RELENTLESS QUEST TOWARD ZERO EVENTS OF PREVENTABLE HARM. OUR PEOPLE WE ARE AN INCLUSIVE TEAM OF PURPOSE-DRIVEN PEOPLE INSPIRED AND UNITED BY OUR PASSION TO CARE FOR EACH OTHER, OUR PATIENTS AND OUR COMMUNITIES. WE ALWAYS REMEMBER, OUR BUSINESS IS THE CARE OF ALL PEOPLE, STARTING WITH OUR TEAM MEMBERS. OUR PROMISE WE ARE RELENTLESSLY PURSUING REMARKABLE CARE EVERY DAY - SO YOU CAN EXPECT THE COMPASSIONATE, EXPERT, PERSONAL EXPERIENCE YOU DESERVE.

IN JANUARY 2023, CAROLINA MEDICORP ENTERPRISES, INC. CONVERTED TO A LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC, A TAX-EXEMPT HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION, AND ALL CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE REPORTED ON THE NOVANT HEALTH, INC.'S FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NOVANT HEALTH-GOHEALTH URGENT CARE, LLC ("MANAGER") WAS FORMED TO DEVELOP, OUTFIT AND MANAGE CERTAIN URGENT CARE PRACTICES OF THE FILING ORGANIZATION CAROLINA MEDICORP ENTERPRISES, INC. ("CME"). CME RETAINS OPERATIONAL CONTROL OF EXEMPT CLINICAL OPERATIONS AND THE PROVISION OF PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL SERVICES. THE MANAGER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR CERTAIN MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES INCLUDING NON-CLINICAL OPERATIONAL OVERSIGHT, STRATEGIC PLANNING, UTILIZATION REVIEW AND QUALITY ASSURANCE, MARKETING AND BRANDING, FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT INCLUDING ACCOUNTING, BUDGET PREPARATION, BILLING AND COLLECTIONS, PROVIDER CONTRACTING AND CREDENTIALING, FACILITIES AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY MANAGEMENT, REGULATORY AND RISK MANAGEMENT, CONTRACTING/PURCHASING SERVICES, AND RECRUITMENT/PERSONNEL STAFFING SERVICES. NO CURRENT OR FORMER OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, TRUSTEES, KEY EMPLOYEES OR HIGHEST COMPENSATED EMPLOYEES WERE COMPENSATED BY THE MANAGEMENT COMPANY DURING THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4: SIGNIFICANT CHANGES TO GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARTICLES OF CONVERSION, WHICH WERE FILED IN JANUARY 2023, HAVE BEEN ATTACHED TO THIS FORM 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6: CLASSES OF MEMBERS OR STOCKHOLDERS THE CORPORATION IS A NONPROFIT CORPORATION WITH MEMBERS (OR A MEMBER). MEMBERS HAVE CERTAIN RIGHTS SUBJECT TO THE POWERS RESERVED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS THE BOARD OF NOVANT HEALTH, INC. APPOINTS THE CAROLINA MEDICORP ENTERPRISE TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B: DECISIONS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF MEMBERS THE BOARD OF NOVANT HEALTH, INC. APPROVES CHANGES TO THE BYLAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS TO REVIEW FORM 990 NO FORMAL REVIEW OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 WAS CONDUCTED BY THE GOVERNING BODY PRIOR TO FILING FOR THE SHORT TAX YEAR ENDED JANUARY 31, 2023. FUTURE INFORMATION REGARDING THE OPERATIONS OF THIS ORGANIZATION WILL BE REPORTED ON FORM 990 OF NOVANT HEALTH, INC., WHICH IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY ITS GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C: MONITORING AND ENFORCEMENT OF COI THE ORGANIZATION'S TRUSTEE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY APPLIES TO ALL TRUSTEES, PRINCIPAL OFFICERS OR MEMBERS OF A COMMITTEE WITH BOARD DELEGATED POWERS INCLUDING ANY APPLICABLE DISREGARDED ENTITIES. ALL TRUSTEES ARE SENT AN ANNUAL DISCLOSURE QUESTIONNAIRE. THE TRUSTEE ANNUAL DISCLOSURE QUESTIONNAIRES ARE REVIEWED BY THE COMPLIANCE DEPARTMENT. WITH RESPECT TO PARTICULAR TRANSACTIONS THAT COME BEFORE THE BOARD, THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY WOULD BE FOLLOWED. THE POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST WOULD BE DISCLOSED BY THE BOARD MEMBER BEFORE A VOTE ON THE TRANSACTION AND THE REST OF THE BOARD WOULD DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS. IF THE REST OF THE BOARD DETERMINED THAT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTED THEN THE BOARD MEMBER WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST WOULD NOT PARTICIPATE IN THE DELIBERATIONS AND VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS DISCLOSURE THE AUDITED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS CONTAINING ALL ORGANIZATIONS IN THE NOVANT HEALTH SYSTEM ARE POSTED TO THE NOVANT HEALTH WEBSITE. THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION B: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN JANUARY 2023, THE ORGANIZATION CONVERTED TO A LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY NOVANT HEALTH, INC, A TAX-EXEMPT HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION, AND ALL CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE REPORTED ON THE NOVANT HEALTH, INC.'S FORM 990. SINCE THIS IS A SHORT YEAR RETURN IN WHICH THERE IS NO CALENDAR YEAR THAT ENDS WITH OR WITHIN THE SHORT YEAR, WE ARE NOT REPORTING THE HIGHEST COMPENSATED INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS ON THIS RETURN (BECAUSE SUCH PERSONS ARE DETERMINED ACCORDING TO COMPENSATION RECEIVED IN THE CALENDAR YEAR ENDING WITH OR WITHIN THE TAX YEAR FOR WHICH THE RETURN IS FILED).
CONVERSION TO SMLLC OF NOVANT HEALTH, INC. 46,888,000.
